name: @mikosoft/dodo-skel
title: DoDo Skel
description: Skeleton code for a new project made in DoDo Framework.
author: Mikodanic Sasa <smikodanic@gmail.com>

scripts.dev-inst: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.dev: node sys/compileViews.js & npx parcel src/app.html --dist-dir dist --port 3333 --no-cache
scripts.prod-inst: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm install --production
